SELECT goods.image, goods.originalPrice,goods.goods_detail goodsDetail,goods.name,goods.goodsId FROM( SELECT g.id goodsId, p.id AS goodsPriceId, g.thumbnail_icon AS image, p.actual_amount AS originalPrice, d.lowestPrice, d.type, g.`name`, g.goods_detail FROM af_goods g JOIN af_goods_price p ON g.id = p.goods_id AND p.is_delete = 0 AND g.is_delete = 0 JOIN af_de_goods d ON p.id = d.goodsPriceId AND d.is_delete = 0
) goods RIGHT JOIN af_de_goods ug ON goods.goodsPriceId = ug.goodsPriceId where ug.goodsPriceId = #{goodspriceid} and ug.is_delete = 0 LIMIT 0,1
SELECT ug.cutPrice from af_de_user_goods ug where ug.userId = #{userid} AND ug.goodsPriceId = #{goodspriceid} and ug.is_delete = 0 LIMIT 0,1

SELECT g.cutcount,g.cutprice,u.user_name userName,u.mobile FROM af_de_user_goods g LEFT JOIN af_user u ON u.id = g.userId where goodsPriceId = #{goodspriceid} and u.is_delete = 0 and g.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY cutCount DESC ,cutPrice DESC
